item.title: How to apply filters on your photo | PhotoGrid Tutorial
item.description: Crop, rotation, resize, blur and beautify your photos easily, you can even frame your images in Instagram's 1:1 aspect ratio! Add stickers, texts, backgrounds, graffiti, boarders and pixelization, or adjust your photo's brightness, contrast, saturation and layout! The latest smart facial recognition tech helps soften wrinkles, even out skin tones and remove blemishes instantly with a single tap. *{padding:0;margin:0;overflow:hidden}html,body{height:100%}img,span{position:absolute;width:100%;top:0;bottom:0;margin:auto}span{height:1.5em;text-align:center;font:48px/1.5 sans-serif;color:white;text-shadow:0 0 0.5em black}‚ñ∂" frameborder="0" rel="0" style="position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; border:0;"

item.title: How to create snowing effect | PhotoGrid Tutorial
item.description: Apply a filter to lighten your photo. Find Shiny Bright sticker (it's free) and enlarge the snow sticker. Tap the sticker and use eraser to erase the snow on your face üòÜ. *{padding:0;margin:0;overflow:hidden}html,body{height:100%}img,span{position:absolute;width:100%;top:0;bottom:0;margin:auto}span{height:1.5em;text-align:center;font:48px/1.5 sans-serif;color:white;text-shadow:0 0 0.5em black}‚ñ∂" frameborder="0" rel="0" style="position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; border:0;" allowfullscreen title="How to create snowing effect"

item.title: Slide Show Maker - Share your best moments with your friends
item.description: Create slideshows with up to 50 images and add your favorite music, it's easy! Pick your photos and videos. Select your favorite filters and transitions. Choose the music from our gallery or your own songs and recordings. Save it to your camera roll and share it on Facebook, Instagram or Youtube. *{padding:0;margin:0;overflow:hidden}html,body{height:100%}img,span{position:absolute;width:100%;top:0;bottom:0;margin:auto}span{height:1.5em;text-align:center;font:48px/1.5 sans-serif;color:white;text-shadow:0 0 0.5em black}‚ñ∂" frameborder="0" rel="0" style="position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; border:0;"
